overview: Oedipus the Tyrant.  A tragedy by Sophocles translated by Friedrich Holderlin.  Music by Carl Orff.
tagline: A live performance of Orff"s Oedipus the Tyrant, part one of his Sophocles' Tragedies, performed over two nights during the 20068/07 Darmstadt Season
title: Orff:  Oedipus Der Tyrann
